overview: Trimmomatic is a widely-used tool in bioinformatics for the preprocessing and quality control of high-throughput sequencing data, such as those from next-generation sequencing platforms. It offers various functions to remove adapters, trim low-quality reads, and filter sequences based on user-defined parameters.
core_features: Adapter trimming for removing sequencing adaptors
Quality-based filtering to remove low-quality reads
Support for trimming and cropping reads based on quality scores
Multiple filtering and trimming options for customized processing
